data.title: Pfizer Worker Who Traded On Paxlovid Secrets Gets 9 Mos.
data.meta_description: A Manhattan federal judge sentenced a former Pfizer Inc. statistician from New Jersey to nine months in prison Tuesday after a jury convicted him of insider trading on secrets about his former company's COVID-19 therapy trials for an illegal $272,000 profit.
